DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether heparin-coated dialysis filter superior conventional filter hemodialysis twelve stable , chronic hemodialysis ( HD ) patient . The antithrombogenic property heparin-coated dialysis filter conventional filter compare mean statistical test .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Pre Heparin Coated Dialysis Filter Coagulation During Hemodialysis
DOC.detailed_description: In present study twelve chronic hemodialysis ( HD ) patient include . Exclusion criterion use acetylsalicylic acid and/warfarin , clinical sign infection disseminate malignant disease . For patient four HD session investigate ; alternate use pre-heparin-coated filter conventional filter . Dalteparin reduce 50 % conventional dose give one single bolus dose start HD . The venous drip chamber visually inspect evaluation clot score HD session . The filter visually inspect clot score end session . Blood specimen draw systematically HD session evaluate platelet coagulation activity well anti Factor Xa activity , haematology urea/creatinine evaluate dialysis effect . The antithrombogenic property pre-heparin-coated filter conventional filter compare mean statistical test . The hypothesis pre-heparin-coated filter induces significantly less clot score extracorporeal system hemodialysis also significantly less intravascular activation coagulation system compare conventional filter .
DOC.criteria: Stable HD patient least 18 year age . HD treatment least one month . Dialysis time least 4 hour three time per week . Stable Hemoglobin value least 11 g/dl last 4 week . Use warfarin and/or acetylsalicylic acid . Disseminated malignant disease . Clinical sign infection .
